page.title: The $itemName
page.text: A $itemName, is an energy weapon, capable of stunning or killing an living being. The $itemName has 2 main settings and levels between them.

The $itemName also requires power to function and can hold up to 64K FE on itâ€™s own. It can also use any FE Energy Storage, such as a Battery. The $itemName can also be upgraded with Weapon Modules at the [block name=weapon_station]

page.title: Customization
page.text: Like most energy weapons the $itemName can be rapidly recharged by [item name=energy_pack], overhead if fired continually without stopping and can be upgraded using weapon modules at the [block name=weapon_station].
The $itemName allows for all types of weapon modules except the weapon sights.
